price: Wͻn a wͻnnye Daakye no nnie no wͻ mfatoho bͻne, na Nyankopͻn na ͻwͻ mfatoho anaasε abodin a εkorͻn. Ɔne Otumfoͻ no a Ɔtumi ade nyinaa yɛ, Ɔne Onyansafoͻ no.
arabic: لِلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ مَثَلُ ٱلسَّوۡءِۖ وَلِلَّهِ ٱلۡمَثَلُ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: lilladhīna lā yu'minūna bil-ākhirati mathalu al-sawi walillahi al-mathalu al-aʿlā wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
